meta.name: description
meta.content: The Jefferson County Elections Division conducts elections according to state statute, encourages voter participation and equality within each segment of Jefferson County and is committed to accuracy and integrity.

div.class: inner col col24 first last id00b10f6b-e5a7-4708-9f80-11b78fc9e3c4
inner col col24 first last id0c20e551-41fd-4cb8-9e60-619442fb418e

div.p: Welcome, voter! We're proud to be your source for official election information. Looking for your nearest ballot box or where to vote in-person? Or the most recent election returns and results? Maybe you want to update your voter registration or are looking for answers to your election questions. Whatever you're here for, we can help.

p.strong: Free and fair elections. Friendly service and safe record keeping. That's our commitment to you.

div.class: inner col col8 first last idd98e923f-856f-4666-97cf-8bb25843d6f2

div.p: Register to vote, find a voting location, track your ballot, or take a tour!

div.class: inner col col8 first last idb57eccfc-5cf7-4eb2-bbae-c3d2bd9fda71

div.p: Be an election worker or watcher, provide feedback on key issues, and more

div.class: inner col col8 first last id88985afc-afbf-4413-bacc-0a09f08a713c

div.p: See what's on the ballot, learn about election security, and get answers to FAQs

div.class: inner col col8 first last idbd0cd1d1-d5a4-4587-9ba2-1be4b3492805

div.p: Contact the Jefferson County Elections Office

div.class: inner col col8 first last id6cc71285-0e8a-4543-9d1a-52f1e6c13de8

br.p: Find election results and daily updates on voter turnout

div.class: inner col col8 first last id35d85867-9c34-4cd5-b033-0ce50945fd1b

div.p: Obtenga información importante sobre votaciones y elecciones en español

div.class: inner col col24 first last ided4cf69a-d858-424c-9286-4ecca450687e

img.alt: Three people wearing superhero capes push carts with bins of ballots next to a ballot sorter

p.img: Elections are run by your friends and neighbors! For this November's election, we're hiring 900 temporary election workers for a variety of important roles. If you're looking for meaningful work that will make a difference in your community, consider joining our team! Time commitment varies by role, ranging from a couple of days to a couple of months, with many schedule options available. Our election workers are the heart of democracy in Jeffco, and you won't find a more fun and fulfilling place to work!

a.aria-label: Be an Election Worker, opens in new window
a.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #993422; color: #fff; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: .2em; padding: 10px 20px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2); border-radius: 3px;

img.alt: Group of people standing in a warehouse around a ballot processing machine with tables and ductwork

p.img: Free tours of the Jeffco Election Center are open to the public in the weeks leading up to each election! Tours last about an hour, and you'll get a behind-the-scenes look at ballot transport, processing, signature verification, and vote counting, plus insights into election security and accessibility. If your group is interested in a tour outside of the public tour timeframe, please email [email protected] with your request.

a.aria-label: Reserve a Tour Spot, opens in new window
a.style: height: 40px; width: fit-content; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; background-color: #993422; color: #fff; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: .2em; padding: 5px 16px; text-transform: uppercase; text-decoration: none; box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.2); border-radius: 3px;
